## Filters.RangeInputProps.fieldId property

The fieldId used for filtering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fieldId?: string;
```

## Remarks

When fieldId is unspecified, it defaults to the defaultFieldId of the nearest [Filters.FilterGroup()](./answers-react-components.filters.filtergroup.md)<!-- -->. If there is no fieldId or defaultFieldId, the component does not render and an error is logged.
